column4: Hi there. Can anyone tell me why the chat page appeared momentarily and the disappeared during my fist connect to this channel (i'm completely new to ubuntu and irc)
sounds like a bug in your IRC client, perhaps
i'm using ubuntu 10.04 empathy. Is it known to be buggy?
Empathy? Yeah. Not good for IRC in the past, though I haven't tried the version that comes with 10.04.
try installing xchat instead. A lot of beginners use xchat.
Can you recommend a better prog?
and it's been around for ages so is very stable
personally I use irssi, but that isn't as beginner-friendly.
hi tripelb, my needs are quite modest. I'm trying to use this channel to solve bigger problems.
yes that would be great. Where do i start?
Can we start again? I will try to explain better>
okay, first thing to learn about is repositories and synaptic/apt-get. These are what you use to install software on Ubuntu, usually.
see what ubottu just said about Synaptic? Follow the link
ok now text is flashing by so fast i can't read anything.
